channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Deep Security Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Deep Security Agent

item.title: CVE-2019-15627|2024-08-05T00:56:21.684Z -- trend%20micro -- deep%20security%20agent
item.description: Versions 10.0, 11.0 and 12.0 of the Trend Micro Deep Security Agent are vulnerable to an arbitrary file delete attack, which may lead to availability impact. Local OS access is required. Please note that only Windows agents are affected.
